channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: NPR battles Trump executive order in court
item.description: NPR was in court for a pivotal hearing arguing that the Trump administration had broken the law with its treatment of public media.

item.title: China in diplomatic push to isolate Japan in feud over Taiwan issue
item.description: No end in sight to spat between Japan and China over Taiwan, as neither Tokyo nor Beijing shows signs of backing down.

item.title: How the Hong Kong High-Rise Fire Became So Deadly
item.description: Hazardous construction materials, the buildings’ design and a series of safety failures likely enabled the blaze to spread with devastating speed.
